Check out all the crazy movie categories.S SHARE 247 CONNECT 54 TWEET 1 COMMENTEMAILMORE
The awards just keep rolling.
 MTV today announced the nominees for the 2014 MTV Movie Awards with American Hustle and The Wolf of Wall Street leading the pack.  Each film has eight nominations.
 Other highlights: Robert De Niro, Kanye West and Joan Rivers are competing against each other in the best cameo category.
 Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto take on Ice Cube and Kevin Hart in the best on-screen duo category.
 And Jennifer Aniston is nominated in the best shirtless performance category, competing with Zac Efron, Chris Hemsworth, Leonardo DiCaprio and Sam Claflin.
 Conan O'Brien is set to host the show, airing live on April 13 at 9 p.m. ET from the Nokia Theatre LA Live in Los Angeles.
 Voting starts today and runs through April 12 in categories including best comedic performance, best villain, best kiss, best scared-as-s*** performance, best musical moment, #WTF moment, best fight and more.  Voting for movie of the year will continue throughout the live broadcast of the show.
 The nominees are:

results.title: MTV announces 2014 Movie Award nominees

results.body:
'American Hustle' and 'The Wolf of Wall Street' lead the 2014 MTV Movie Awards nominations.
 Both films have snagged eight nods apiece, while 'The Hunger Games: Catching Fire' follows closely behind with seven nominations, and raunchy comedy 'We're the Millers' has six.
 'Hustle', 'Wall Street' and 'Catching Fire' will all compete for the Movie of the Year prize, along with '12 Years a Slave' - which earned the prestigious Best Picture prize at the Academy Awards on Sunday - and 'The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug'.
 Jennifer Lawrence and Sandra Bullock lead the Best Actress nominations for 'Catching Fire' and 'Gravity', respectively, and they are joined in the category by Jennifer's 'American Hustle' co-star Amy Adams, 'We're the Millers' star Jennifer Aniston and recently crowned Oscar winner Lupita Nyong'o for '12 Years a Slave'.
 Meanwhile, Best Actor nominees include 'Dallas Buyers Club' leading man Matthew McConaughey - who won the equivalent award at the Oscars - Chiwetel Ejiofor ('12 Years'), Josh Hutcherson ('Catching Fire'), Leonardo DiCaprio ('Wall Street') and Bradley Cooper ('American Hustle').
 The humorous movie awards will also crown winners for Best Kiss, Best Shirtless Performance and WTF Moment.
 Nominees for the topless award include Zac Efron for 'That Awkward Moment' and Australian hunk Chris Hemsworth for 'Thor: The Dark World'.
 Cameron Diaz has also earned a nomination for WTF Moment following her infamous sex scene with a car in 'The Counselor'.
 The 2014 MTV Movie Awards, hosted by Conan O'Brien, take place on April 13 and will emanate from the Nokia Theater in Los Angeles.

results.title: American Hustle, Wolf of Wall Street lead MTV Movie Awards nods

results.body:
The Oscars are over but never fear, we still have the MTV Movie Awards to look forward to!  Yes, you might think that Lupita Nyong'o wholly deserved her Best Supporting Actress Oscar, but what you really, reallllly want to know is what film kiss was the best film kiss.  You're itching to know who the hero of the year is!  You're desperate to know which far-too-good-for-this actor has put in the Best Scared As Shit performance, Vera Farmiga or Jessica Chastain?  And you only have to wait until April 13th to find out!
 Here's the whole list of nominees.  It's quite ridiculous.

results.title: MTV Movie Awards: all the nominees in a list for you to read on the toilet!

results.body:
full size Credit: Francois Duhamel © 2013 Annapurna Productions LLC Photo: Amy Adams, Bradley Cooper, Jeremy Renner, Christian Bale, and Jennifer Lawrence in American Hustle
It's the most wonderful time of the year!  No, not Christmas, awards show season.  And now that the Oscars are behind us, it's time to focus on one of our favorites: the MTV Movie Awards.  The full nominations list was finally revealed this morning, which means it's time for the voting to begin!
 So who's up for the golden popcorn this year?  Unsurprisingly, American Hustle and The Wolf of Wall Street both stacked up the most nominations -- 8 each.  Between Hustle and Catching Fire, it sounds like Jennifer Lawrence might be spending a lot of time up on that stage this year... just where we like her.
 And as for the way-more-fun categories?  Best Kiss nominees include J.Law and Amy Adams's bathroom smooch from American Hustle and the so-awkward-we-could-barely-watch Spring Breakers scene involving James Franco, Ashley Benson, and Vanessa Hudgens that we are too traumatized to recount now.
 The awards, broadcast live from the Nokia Theater in LA, will be hosted by Conan O'Brien on April 13 at 9 p.m. ET.
 Here's the full list of nominees:
Movie of the Year:
12 Years a Slave
American Hustle
The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
The Wolf of Wall Street

James Franco, Ashley Benson and Vanessa Hudgens -- Spring Breakers
Shailene Woodley and Miles Teller -- The Spectacular Now
Emma Roberts, Jennifer Aniston and Will Poulter -- We're the Millers
Best Fight
Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues -- Will Ferrell, Paul Rudd, David Koechner and Steve Carell vs. James Marsden vs. Sacha Baron Cohen vs. Kanye West vs. Tina Fey and Amy Poehler vs. Jim Carrey and Marion Cotillard vs. Will Smith vs. Liam Neeson and John C. Reilly vs. Greg Kinnear

The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug -- Orlando Bloom and Evangeline Lilly vs. Orcs
The Hunger Games: Catching Fire -- Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson and Sam Claflin vs. Mutant Monkeys

results.title: MTV announces 2014 Movie Award nominees

results.body:
Yesterday we told you that everyone's favorite freakishly tall, redheaded late-night host Conan O'Brien will be hosting this year's MTV Movie Awards.  Well, today we can tell you who's likely to join him in Los Angeles' Nokia Theatre on April 12, as MTV has announced the full list of nominees.
 As you likely already know, these aren't your average award-show categories.  Instead of "Best Sound Mixing" and "Best Production Design," there's "Best Scared-As-S**t Performance" and "Best #WTF Moment." " Instead of "Best Editing" and "Best Costume Design," there's "Best Shirtless Performance" and the always salacious "Best Kiss." " But, despite MTV's edgier categories, the same prestigious movies that dominated the Oscars are also leading the pack here.  Both American Hustle and Wolf of Wall Street scored eight nominations apiece, while Sunday's Best Picture winner 12 Years a Slave scored a Movie of The Year nod, as well as a Best Female Performance for Lupita Nyong'o, because from now on awards shows aren't allowed to happen unless she is some way involved.  Kudos to MTV for realizing that.
 Check out the entire list of super-fun, super-sexy nominees below.  (MTV)

results.body:
The full list of nominations for the 2014 MTV Movie Awards has just been revealed, and the competition for the Golden Popcorn might be the toughest in years.
 Perhaps more than ever, this the nominations for the 2014 MTV Movie Awards are a mix of the year's biggest blockbusters and the awards season powerhouses.  The list, which was just revealed, includes Oscar favorites like "American Hustle" and "The Wolf of Wall Street" (leading with 8 noms each) and enormous franchise flicks like "The Hunger Games: Catching Fire." "
But now, the real choice is up to you.  Take a look at the full list of nomination and vote before the MTV Movie Awards on April 13 at 9:00 p.m. ET/PT and hosted by Conan O'Brien.

results.body:
The MTV Movie Awards are coming at us April 13 with Conan O'Brien as host!  The music network announced their nominations and leading the way with eight each is American Hustle and The Wolf of Wall Street.  And yes, Academy Awards Best Picture winner 12 Years a Slave scored a nod in the Movie of the Year category.
 O'Brien took to his TBS show to make the announcement that he is hosting.  And from the look of the below video, he thinks it's the highest honor in the arts.
 Conan O'Brien to Host MTV Movie Awards
The MTV Movie Awards also sets itself apart from the other movie awards in that its categories are actually kinda interesting.  Best Kiss nominees this year include Amy Adams and Jennifer Lawrence from American Hustle, as well as Shailene Woodley and Miles Teller from The Spectacular Now.
 Also, the Best Fight category always proves interesting.  This year, look for the film that gave us Anchorman 2 quotes to also be honored for its massive park fight featuring a who's-who of Hollywood!
 Here's the list of nominees for the 2014 MTV Movie Awards:
MOVIE OF THE YEAR
12 Years a Slave American Hustle The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug The Hunger Games: Catching Fire The Wolf of Wall Street

You can see several of the nominees right now!  Watch Dallas Buyers Club online, watch 12 Years a Slave online and watch Captain Phillips online!
 The MTV Movie Awards can get a little crazy over the years.  Click through and see the 13 craziest moments below!
13 MTV Movie Awards Crazy Moments Open Slideshow 1.  Jim Carrey Channels Foghat Jim Carrey showed up to accept his award for The Truman Show dressed like...  Foghat.  Is it us, but we always thought it was Jim Morrison!  View As List 1.  Jim Carrey Channels Foghat
Jim Carrey showed up to accept his award for The Truman Show dressed like...  Foghat.  Is it us, but we always thought it was Jim Morrison!
2.  Moulin Rouge Ladies Sing Together!
 Lady Marmalade was the perfect song to choose as the "theme" to Moulin Rouge.  But, getting all those divas on one stage... simply brilliant and totally crazy.
 3.  Bruno Meet Eminem
When Bruno (Sacha Baron Cohen) fell from the ceiling and his butt landed on Eminem, it defined insanity.  Of all the people, in all the auditoriums to fall on!
4.  Ken Jeong and Ed Helms Sing Hangover Song
Ken Jeong was wisely asked to sing The Hangover song with Ed Helms.  But when he showed up in a unitard?
5.  Will Ferrell & Mark Wahlberg "Drop" In
Tom Felton was giving a speech for his Harry Potter award when The Other Guys, aka Mark Wahlberg and Will Ferrell dropped in.  And then they got stuck.
 6.  Jimmy Fallon Slams Star Wars Prequels
When Jimmy Fallon hosted in 2005, one of the bits he did was utterly classic.  Ridiculing the wooden performance of Anakin Skyalker in the Star Wars prequel was ripe... and he nailed it.
 7.  RPatz and KStew Almost Kiss
How many times did RPatz and KStew win the Best Kiss award at the MTV Movie Awards?  Lots!  And although everyone knew they were dating in real life, they just kept teasing us with "not" kissing.  Not that, that is crazy.
 8.  Meet Tom Crooze
Ben Stiller does a fabulous Tom Cruise imitation.  So, what better way to show that off than a bit where he plays Tom Crooze, Cruise's "stunt double." " Cruise brilliantly plays along.
 9.  Justin Manhandles Mila
Sure, they were Friends with Benefits ON screen.  But, when the appeared together at the MTV Movie Awards, they had fun with it OFF screen.
 10.  Sarah Silverman Takes it to Paris Hilton
I was there... it was uncomfortable!  Host Sarah Silverman went off on attendee Paris Hilton in her monologue.  And the prize for Hilton... getting hauled off to jail after the show for a required (short) prison stay.
 11.  Mrs. Brady Does Basic Instinct
In 2003, the MTV Movie Awards got Florence Henderson to pretend to be Mrs. Brady pretending to be Sharon Stone in Basic Instinct.  It.  Was.  Awesome.
 12.  Les Grossman Boogies with J. Lo
Les Grossman, who we loved in Tropic Thunder, made a surprise visit to the MTV Movie Awards stage.  And even danced with J. Lo!
13.  Seth Rogen and James Franco Toke Up
Doing nothing to supress their reputation as potheads, Seth Rogen and James Franco light up on stage!

results.body:
The nominations for the 2014 MTV Movie Awards have been released, with "American Hustle" and "The Wolf of Wall Street" leading the nominations with eight each.
 "The Hunger Games: Catching Fire" follows close behind with seven nominations, including Best Picture and Best Female Performance for the movie's star, Jennifer Lawrence.
 "12 Years a Slave," the Oscar best picture winner, is among the nominees for movie of the year.
 *Also read:* Conan O'Brien Tapped to Host MTV Movie Awards
Other notable nominations include Michael B. Jordan for Breakthrough Performance, Best Kiss for Jennifer Lawrence and Amy Adams in "American Hustle" and Best Shirtless Performance for Jennifer Aniston in "We're the Millers." "
Voting for the movie awards categories opens on Thursday at MovieAwards.M MTV.c com.
 *Also read:* 'American Hustle' Costume Designer Michael Wilkinson Teases New Wonder Woman Costume (Video)
The MTV Movie Awards will be broadcast live from the Nokia Theatre LA Live on April 13 at 9 p.m., with Conan O'Brien hosting the festivities.

Spoiler alert!  Backstreet Boys reunite in heaven to perform "Everybody" with signature boy band moves and flair for this unforgettable apocalyptic ending.
 * Jennifer Lawrence - "American Hustle" (Columbia Pictures)
Lawrence cleans and dances her frustrations away as she mouths the words to 70s classic "Live and Let Die." "
* Leonardo DiCaprio - "The Wolf of Wall Street" (Paramount Pictures)
During his wedding reception, DiCaprio's fraudulent Jordan Belfort pops and locks it to Bo Diddley's "Pretty Thing." "
* Melissa McCarthy - "Identity Thief" (Universal Pictures)
To ease the tension of stealing Sandy's identity, McCarthy's Diana shows her musical range as she attempts to sing along with the car radio -- and even hits that high note in "Barracuda." "
* Will Poulter - "We're the Millers" (New Line Cinema)
With eyes wide shut, Poulter's Kenny Rossmore throws it back to the 90s with a hilarious rendition of TLC's "Waterfalls." "
*BEST CAMEO PERFORMANCE*
* Robert De Niro - "American Hustle" (Columbia Pictures)
* Amy Poehler and Tina Fey - "Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues" (Paramount Pictures)
* Kanye West - "Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues" (Paramount Pictures)
* Joan Rivers - "Iron Man 3'' (Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures)
* Rihanna - "This is the End" (Columbia Pictures)
*BEST HERO*
* Henry Cavill as Clark Kent - "Man of Steel" (Warner Bros.  Pictures)
* Robert Downey Jr. as Iron Man - "Iron Man 3'' (Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures)
* Martin Freeman as Bilbo Baggins - "The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug" (Warner Bros.  Pictures)
* Chris Hemsworth as Thor - "Thor: The Dark World" (Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures)
* Channing Tatum as John Cale - "White House Down" (Columbia Pictures)

results.body:
El próximo 13 de abril, se celebrará una nueva versión de los MTV Movie Awards, y el canal norteamericano reveló quienes son los nominados.
 Dentro de los más destacados están 12 años de esclavitud, Hobbit: La desolación de Smaug, La Gran Estafa Americana, Los juegos del Hambre y El Lobo de Wall Street que postulan a 'película del año'.
 Otro que quiere conseguir el premio es Leonardo Di Caprio, que en la última entrega de los Oscar se fue con las manos vacías, ahora destaca como nominado a 'mejor actor'.
 Ayer también se informó que Conan O'Brien será el animador del certamen que se realizará en el teatro Nokia de Los Angeles.

results.title: Revelan los nominados para los MTV Movie Awards 2014

results.body:
"12 años de esclavitud" competirá contra "Los juegos del hambre: en llamas" en premiación de la cadena estadounidense
La película ganadora del Oscar "12 años de esclavitud" competirá con éxitos de taquilla como "Los juegos del hambre: En llamas" y "El Hobbit: La desolación de Smaug" en los MTV Movie Awards, que hoy anunciaron a todos sus nominados.
 La mayoría de los actores postulados en las categorías más importantes compitieron también por Premios Oscar incluidos los ganadores Matthew McConaughey y Lupita Nyong'o y Leonardo DiCaprio.
 Pero a diferencia de los premios de la Academia, en los MTV Movie Awards quienes deciden son los espectadores.  La ceremonia se realizará el próximo 13 de abril con Conan O'Brien como conductor.  Esta es la lista completa de nominados.  ¿Por quién votarías tú?

Bradley Cooper por "Escándalo americano"
Leonardo Dicaprio por "El lobo de Wall Street"
Chiwetel Ejiofor por "12 años de esclavitud"

Matthew McConaughey por "El club de los desahuciados"

Michael B. Jordan por "Fruitvale Station"

results.body:
La película ganadora del Oscar 12 años de esclavitud competirá con éxitos de taquilla como Los juegos del hambre: En llamas y El Hobbit: La desolación de Smaug en los Premios MTV al Cine.
 La cadena anunció este jueves los nominados a su 24 entrega anual de estos reconocimientos al séptimo arte.  Las otras candidatas a película del año son El lobo of Wall Street y Escándalo americano.
 La mayoría de los actores postulados compitieron también por Premios de la Academia, incluidos los ganadores Matthew McConaughey y Lupita Nyong'o y el nominado Leonardo DiCaprio.
 La categoría mejor beso tiene un favorito claro: el que se dieron Amy Adams y Jennifer Lawrence en Escándalo Americano.
 Por el premio a la mejor actuación sin camisa, Jennifer Aniston, por Donde están los Millers, competirá por DiCaprio en El Lobo de Wall Street.
 Conan O'Brien será el anfitrión del espectáculo, previsto para el 13 de abril en el Teatro Nokia de Los Ángeles.

results.title: Dan a conocer a nominados a los MTV Movie Awards

results.body:
Puede que los Oscar hayan cerrado la temporada de premios de Hollywood, pero eso no significa que no se haya acabado la diversión.
 Finalmente fueron anunciados los nominados a los MTV Movie Awards, los reconocidos premios que entrega la cadena de televisión desde 1992.
 Este año American Hustle y El Lobo de Wall Street lideran con 8 nominaciones cada una, mientras que Los Juegos del Hambre: En Llamas las sigue de cerca con 7.
 La ceremonia tendrá lugar el 13 de abril en el Teatro Nokia de la ciudad de Los Angeles y serán conducidos por Connan O'Brien.  Acerca de la elección e, presentador comentó en un comunicado: "Tras ocho años de negociaciones, me honra anunciar que conduciré el segundo premio más importante para MTV".
 Acá puedes ver la lista completa de nominados:

results.title: Conoce la lista completa de nominados a los premios MTV Movie Awards 2014

results.body:
CIUDAD DE MÉXICO.- - La cadena de televisión dio a conocer los nominados para la edición de este año a los MTV Movie Awards, donde las películas American Hustle y The Wolf Of Wall Street lideran las candidaturas.
 Según anunciaron hoy sus organizadores, entre las candidatas a mejor filme figuran The Hunger Games: Catching Fire, The Hobbit: The Desolation Of Smaug y la cinta ganadora del Oscar en la categoría a Mejor Película 12 Years A Slave.
 Además American Hustle y The Wolf Of Wall Street, que se quedaron sin la dorada estatuilla, parten ahora como favoritas con ocho candidaturas a llevarse un MTV Movie Award el próximo 13 de abril.
 Conan O'Brien será el conductor de los premios que se realizarán en el teatro Nokia de Los Ángeles.
 Los premios MTV son elegidos por el público a través del voto en la páginaweb de la cadena de televisión e incluyen categorías como Mejor Beso, Mejor Pelea, Mejor Momento sin Camisa o Mejor Transformación en Pantalla.
 Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues (Paramount Pictures) - Will Ferrell, Paul Rudd, David Koechner y Steve Carell vs.  James Marsden vs.  Sacha Baron Cohen vs.  Kanye West vs.  Tina Fey y Amy Poehler vs.  Jim Carrey y Marion Cotillard vs.  Will Smith vs.  Liam Neeson y John C. Reilly vs.  Greg Kinnear.
 Identity Thief (Universal Pictures) - Jason Bateman vs.  Melissa McCarthy.
 The Hobbit: The Desolation Of Smaug (Warner Bros. Pictures) - Orlando Bloom y Evangeline Lilly vs.  Orcos.
 The Hunger Games: Catching Fire (Lionsgate) - Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson y Sam Claflin vs.  Mutant Monkeys.

results.title: MTV difunde su lista de nominados para premios de cine

results.body:
El próximo 13 de abril, se celebrará una nueva versión de los MTV Movie Awards, y el canal norteamericano reveló quienes son los nominados.
 Dentro de los más destacados están 12 años de esclavitud, Hobbit: La desolación de Smaug, Escándalo Americano, Los juegos del Hambre y El Lobo de Wall Street que postulan a "película del año".
 Otro que quiere conseguir el premio es Leonardo Di Caprio, que en la última entrega de los Oscar se fue con las manos vacías, ahora destaca como nominado a 'mejor actor'.
 Ayer también se informó que Conan O'Brien será el animador del certamen que se realizará en el teatro Nokia de Los Angeles.

results.title: Ellos son los nominados a los MTV Movie Awards, incluyen mejores besos

results.body:
"American Hustle" y "The Wolf of Wall Street", que no ganaron premios en los Óscar a pesar de contar con 10 y 5 nominaciones, respectivamente, parten como favoritas en los premios MTV Movie Awards, según la lista anunciada este jueves por el canal.
 Ambas cintas consiguieron 8 nominaciones, incluidas las de mejor película y mejor actor (Bradley Cooper y Leonardo DiCaprio).
 El premio a la mejor película se lo disputarán "12 Years a Slave", "American Hustle", "The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug", "The Hunger Games: Catching Fire" y "The Wolf of Wall Street".
 Cooper y DiCaprio se medirán a Chiwetel Ejiofor ("12 Years a Slave"), Josh Hutcherson ("The Hunger Games: Catching Fire") y Matthew McConaughey ("Dallas Buyers Club") por ser designado al mejor actor.
 El título de mejor actriz estará entre Amy Adams ("American Hustle"), Jennifer Aniston ("Were the Millers"), Sandra Bullock ("Gravity"), Jennifer Lawrence ("The Hunger Games: Catching Fire") y Lupita Nyongo ("12 Years a Slave"), en tanto que el galardón al artista descubrimiento del año se disputará entre Liam James ("The Way Way Back"), Michael B. Jordan ("Fruitvale Station"), Will Poulter ("Were the Millers"), Margot Robbie ("The Wolf of Wall Street") y Miles Teller ("The Spectacular Now").
 Estos premios se caracterizan por disponer de categorías tan particulares como mejor beso, mejor pelea, mejor pareja, mejor villano o mejor interpretación sin camiseta.
 Los MTV Movie Awards se celebran en la época que comienzan a llegar los grandes estrenos en Hollywood, por lo que la cadena aprovecha para emitir adelantos exclusivos de algunas de las películas más esperadas de la temporada.
 Los espectadores pueden apoyar a sus candidatos favoritos con sus votos a través del portal www.MovieAwards.MTV.com desde hoy y hasta el 12 de abril.
 Conan OBrien será el presentador de la ceremonia, que tendrá lugar en el Teatro Nokia de Los Ángeles el 13 de abril.
results.title: Escándalo Americano y Lobo de Wall Street, favoritas en los premios MTV
